title: Maternity Services
description: As one of the largest providers of obstetrics and gynecology services in the state and the largest provider of Cincinnati obstetrics and gynecology, Bethesda North and Good Samaritan Hospitals welcome more than 10,000 babies each year.
cleaned_text: Deliver the Most Babies of Any Regional Hospitals It's true that TriHealth delivers more babies each year than any other regional hospital, but we deliver more than just babies. Whether you're a first- time mom or growing your family, TriHealth promises patient-centered care focused on you, your baby and your birth plan. Our OB-GYN physicians offer comprehensive maternity care, but we also provide care for women seeking services including TriHealth provides specialists, including more than 100 physicians and midwives, and state-of-the-art facilities, nationally recognized for getting women's health care right. TriHealth maternity services are available at 3 conveniently located hospitals: Expert NICU Care Should baby need extra care after delivery, TriHealth Good Samaritan Hospital's state-of-the-art [Level III Neonatal Intensive Care services (NICU)](https://www.trihealth.com/institutes-and-services/womens-services/pregnancy-and-childbirth/high-risk-pregnancy/neonatal-intensive-care-nicu/) and the Level II [Harold and Margret Thomas Special Care Nursery](https://www.trihealth.com/institutes-and-services/womens-services/pregnancy-and-childbirth/high-risk-pregnancy/level-II-harold-and-margret-thomas-special-care-nursery/) at Bethesda North provide expert and tender care for babies born too soon or with complications. Expert Care for Complex Fetal Conditions TriHealth is proud to collaborate with Cincinnati Children's Hospital Medical Center through the [Cincinnati Children's Fetal Care Center](https://www.trihealth.com/institutes-and-services/womens-services/high-risk-pregnancy/cincinnati-fetal-center) one of a few comprehensive fetal care centers in the country. Led by physicians from TriHealth, Cincinnati Children's Hospital Medical Center and University of Cincinnati Medical Center, our team specializes in treating complex and rare fetal conditions. No matter your journey to motherhood, TriHealth is the team to deliver quality care for you and your baby. TriHealth has achieved National Safe Sleep Hospital Certification Program's highest designation, Gold Safe Sleep
